title: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Swimming
text: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Swimming +91 – 9177 00 00 56 info@hprc.co.in Member Login Pay Now toggle navigation Home About us Who We Are Mission Vision Values Managing Committee Start Riding About Riding Packages Beginners Riding Programme Intermediate Riding Programme Advanced Riding Programme Polo Equestrian Polo About Polo Stick & Ball Chukkers Events Past Events Upcoming Events SPORTS CENTRE Tennis Badminton Squash Swimming pool Basketball Futsal Gym Sauna Upcoming SportS Event Packages Gold Package Platinum Package RESTAURANTS Chukkers Snaffles Bistro BANQUETS Membership Events & Media Photo Gallery Video Gallery News Events Newsletters Blogs Contact Us Swimming Pool Sport Center Swimming Pool Swimming Pool HPRC has a well maintained swimming pool that is open for all members and guests. Swimming lessons from expert coaches are available for all age groups. Changing rooms and Restroom facilities for ladies and gents are also provided for the members. Fill out the form below to enroll and avail our swimming program benefits. Click here to download the form Timings: Morning 6.00am to 10.00am & Evening 4.00pm to 9.00pm CHARGES CATEGORY Dependent:Under 18 Max 3 Dips per month Per Dip/Day Monthly (No Guests are allowed) Yearly (No Guests are allowed) Member Guest Adults Rs. 295 Rs. 590 Rs. 2950 Rs. 25000 Kids Rs. 295 Rs. 590 Rs. 1950 Rs. 15000 For Coaching ( Adults & Kids ) Rs. 3500 ( 3 Classes per week ) Swimming Pool Rules And Etiquette 1. Beginners to always use the shallow end of the pool 2. Never squeeze your wet clothes in changing area 3. Never smoke or consume alcohol/ tobacco in or near the pool 4. Please use safety lockers and vacate after every use 5. Diving/ shouting and playing with ball is strictly prohibited HYGIENE: 1. Always shower thoroughly before and after using the pool 2. Swimming costume with head cap is compulsory 3. Inner wear of any types is not allowed along with swim costume 4. T-shirts, leggings & tights, shorts, frocks and hosiery are not allowed 5. Never swim with contagious/ skin diseases or open wounds 6. Keep your nails clean and do not spit or urinate in the pool IMPORTANT GUIDE LINES: 1. The pool is strictly for the use of members of HPRC 2. Guests must be accompanied by the member after approval from the management 3. Kindly sign in the register before using the pool 4. Render a fitness certificate certified by a licenced Medical Practitioner 5. Photography & videos are strictly prohibited in or near the Pool area 6. Pets are not allowed 7. Always close all taps after using the showers, flush & toilets 8. Children below the age of 12 years should be accompanied by an adult 9. While using the pool children below 4 years must wear swim-wear nappies 10. Do not entertain tips / donations to the swimming pool staff 11. Kindly maintain discipline in the pool area SWIMMING POOL TIMINGS: THE POOL WILL BE CLOSED ON ALL MONDAYS 6am - 9am (FOR ALL) 9am - 10am (Ladies Only) 4pm - 5pm (Ladies Only) 5pm - 9pm (For All) ACCOMPANYING GUARDIANS/ PARENTS MUST BE IN THE VIEWING GALLERY ONLY TO OBSERVE THEIR WARDS. THE MANAGEMENTIS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY LOSS/ DAMAGE TO YOUR PERSON, PROPERTY, CASH/ VALUABLES Swimming Pool Gallery Explore Home About Us Membership Login Start Riding Polo News & Events Contact Us Quick links Apply for Membership Pay Now e-Brochure Past Events Facilities Sport Center Restaurants Banquets Address Near Mrugavani Resort and Spa, Aziz Nagar Village, Gandipet, Ranga Reddy District, Hyderabad, Telangana, India - 500075 reaz@hprc.co.in +91 9177000056 View Location On Map Gallery © 2005 – 2024.
